shownInTree: 中拳與4f拳腳相殺數據(維加版本).html
allFiles: 中拳與4f拳腳相殺數據(維加版本).html

必殺/236k.html.title: 236K
必殺/236k.html.description: 最快但最短最遠但最慢對空 & Combo可以當作是輕版的蓄力版

拳腳/2hk.html.title: 2HK
拳腳/2hk.html.description:
遠距離可取消的拳腳
可取消 236LK poke

拳腳/2mk.html.title: 2MK
拳腳/2mk.html.description:
貼身壓制拳腳
打中接 2MK > MP.HP > 6KK(快P) > 626MPlong range stop rush , 但stop唔到用蹲姿攻擊既DR打中強制站立

拳腳/2mp.html.title: 2MP
拳腳/2mp.html.description:
唯一中距離下段攻擊, 所以常用
立回236LK Poke
DR cancel (+10F, 前提是2MP命中):
2MP > HP
HP
HK

拳腳/5hk.html.title: 5HK
拳腳/5hk.html.description:
對空拳腳
對空成功後cancel 6KK 會有壓制機會打不到蹲姿

拳腳/5hp.html.title: 5HP
拳腳/5hp.html.description:
強制對手站立
counter hit > MP

特殊技/psycho-knuckle.html.title: Psycho Knuckle
特殊技/psycho-knuckle.html.description:
蓄力開始計39F後放開是LV1
蓄滿LV2擊暈對手後, Psycho Knuckle 起手比跳攻擊高傷打防: 版中-2, 版邊+2打防+4
LV2 有抵消波既作用
垂直跳
impact

角色對策/aki/6hp.html.title: 6HP
角色對策/aki/6hp.html.description:
近距離時侯
aki的6HP打防 , aki負4F , 可用5LP確反
遠距離時候
前置垂直跳攻擊
前置技

角色對策/aki/od-snake-step.html.title: OD Snake Step
角色對策/aki/od-snake-step.html.description: 該技對打擊技無敵, 但會被投確反, aki版邊被壓常用

角色對策/豪鬼/236k.html.title: 236K
角色對策/豪鬼/236k.html.description: HK打中236K > (Not cancel)DR > HP/HK > 蓄力236K > 214HP > SA3

連段/combo.html.title: Combo
連段/combo.html.description:
5LP > 2LP > 5LP > 214MP , 打對手第二時間後走
5MP > 2LK > 626MP , Oki
任何輕攻擊Rush > LP > MP.HP > 6KK(快P) > 626MPHK打不到遠的, 可以換HP > 2MK起手來確反以下以HP > 2MK > 236KK > 236HK > DR.MP起手的Combo在HP極限距離起手該Combo都成立, 比用HP > 2MK > 236KK > 236P.6LP起手的Combo穩定, 但大部分Combo推版相對前者較差太近打到236KK接不到氣功, 不過用兩個牶腳起手打確反推開的距離大概都能接得上氣功, 如果真的太近了考慮用236HK > ...作後續, 例如236HK > 623LP > 214LP (+42F 安全跳)2LK > MP.HP > 任意收尾
太遠可以選擇用LK.LK.LKTC技來確反, 而且貼身+1LP > 2LP > LP > DR > LP > MP > DR > HK > HP > 6KK(Second P) > 214HP , 輕攻擊起手 ALL IN , 但只可以打站姿LP > 2LP > LP > DR > LP > MP > DR > MP > HP > 6KK(Second P) > 214HP , 輕攻擊起手 ALL IN6KK(遲P)可以接SA16KK(First P) 前面如果冇打懸浮(MP.HP之類) , 無得接後績

連段/drive-impact.html.title: Drive Impact
連段/drive-impact.html.description: 以下Dmg同加Frame數是DI打防上牆情況下的數據, 但Combo部分仍適用於DI打中上牆情況下和確反連差不多, 只是換成 HK > MP.HP / HP > 236KK 起手, 以下提供一些常用連

headers.heading: DI命中後, 敵人處於浮空狀態
headers.id: DI命中後,_敵人處於浮空狀態

連段/drive-rush.html.title: Drive rush
連段/drive-rush.html.description:
以下的LP收尾打中+8, 打防+3
LP後面可以加HP/HK/2MK來打延遲解摔

連段/perfect-parry-確反.html.title: Perfect Parry 確反
連段/perfect-parry-確反.html.description:
當唔知可以用幾多Frame黎確反既時侯, 建議用MP > HP起手, 以下只提供一個簡單連
MP > HP > 6KK(遲P) > 214HP

連段/sa2.html.title: SA2
連段/sa2.html.description: 下面的Dmg是以HP > 214PP作為起手的數據

連段/shimmy.html.title: Shimmy
連段/shimmy.html.description:
HP > 2MK 起手的combo都可用
HP > 2MK > 236KK > 626LP > 214HP (3279), 6KK Oki

連段/跳入.html.title: 跳入
連段/跳入.html.description:
一般跳入使用的拳腳有JHP, JMP, JMK
JHP 在遠距離跳入時候用
JMP 在中近距離用, 該拳腳也是ED唯一的跳入打背技
JMK 配合垂直跳的拳腳
在中距離跳入時JMP會打到敵方角色的低點位, 一般加9到13, 所以JMP後可以接2MK在近距離時JMP一般都選擇打頭頂, 打到只加7, 所以會直接接MP.HPTC技, 以下兩個combo對應了這兩種情況

連段/鏈子.html.title: 鏈子
連段/鏈子.html.description: 不用氣的情況下蓄力236LK的極限範圍或以外只可以接623HP, 不過可以用氣追加以下Combo

dream-combo.html.title: dream combo
dream-combo.html.description: SA2 第一hit 最高點出214HP

中拳與4f拳腳相殺數據(維加版本).html.title: 中拳與4F拳腳相殺數據(維加版本)
中拳與4f拳腳相殺數據(維加版本).html.description:
()內是測試的4F拳腳
Luke: +8 (用2LP測試)
Jamie: +8 (2LP)
manon: +8 (2LP), +7 (LP)
kimberly: +10 (2LP)
marisa: +9 (2LP)
lily: 無4F拳腳
jp: +7 (2LP)
juri: +8 (LP), +9 (2LP)
dj: +11 (LP)
cammy: +9 (LP), +9 (2LP)
ryu: +10 (LP), +9 (2LP)
honda: +7 (2LP), +8 (LK)
blanka: +8 (LK)
gulie: +8 (2LP)
ken: +10 (LP), +8 (2LP)
ghun-li: +9 (LP), +10 (2LP), +12 (2LK)
zangief: +9 (2LK)
dhalsim: +9 (LP), +6 (2LK)
aki: +9 (2LP), +6 (LK)
ed: +10 (LP), +8 (2LP)
gouki: +10 (LP), +8 (2LP)
vega: +8 (2LP), +9 (LK)
最低+6, 最高+11

headers.heading: 中拳與4F拳腳相殺數據(維加版本)

壓起.html.title: 壓起
壓起.html.description:
MP.HP > 6KK(First P) > 626MP (+39F)
66 > DR.2MK , 打中+13 , 打防+4
打到接 HK > 2MP > 214HP.
打防接 MP > 2LK 打亂動.
特性: 不怕D反.
距離足夠可拉蓄力中鏈壓起版邊 :
DR.6HP, 打中+5, 打防+1, 後續可以用2LK做確認
近版 :
LP > DI, 偷DI
版邊 :
2LK > 236P, 波動貼身壓起, 打中+12, 打防+4
6KK > MP, 打中+8, 打防+1
6KK(Second P) > 214HP :
6KK 貼身+9F, 用2MK偷幀可以偷多1F, 打中+9, 打防平幀, 亦可以直接目壓投
版邊 :
2HK > HP, HP 可以偷2F, 打中+7, 打防+0
版邊 :
LK > 236P, 波動貼身壓起, 打中+12, 打防+4
投消費 > HP, HP 可以偷多3F, 打中+8, 打防+1
JHP > HK

index.html.title: 首頁
index.html.description: 請使用左邊的Side bar作為瀏覽該筆記主要方式筆記格式: 通常以以下方式展示連段 Combo前面有顏色的數字是代表這個Combo用了多少格鬥氣, 留意: 展示的鬥氣並不把前置動作計算在內, 如回擊DI連段並不會把DI用的氣計算在內, 去看Drive Impact這頁就會明白 Dmg這列就是Combo的傷害 Description這列就是關於該Combo的一些資訊, 例如常有的打完Combo的有利幀這些, 而且通常都會有超連結給你點去看該Combo要怎麼去壓起身

info_showOrphanNodes.description: Show nodes that are not connected to any other nodes.

info_showAttachments.description: Show attachments like images and PDFs as nodes in the graph.

info_allowGlobalGraph.description: Allow the user to view the global graph of all nodes.

info_allowExpand.description: Allow the user to pop-out the graph view to take up the whole screen

info_attractionForce.description: How much should linked nodes attract each other? This will make the graph appear more clustered.

info_linkLength.description: How long should the links between nodes be? The shorter the links the closer connected nodes will cluster together.

info_repulsionForce.description: How much should nodes repel each other? This will make the graph appear more spread out.

info_centralForce.description: How much should nodes be attracted to the center? This will make the graph appear more dense and circular.

info_edgePruning.description: Edges with a length above this threshold will not be rendered, however they will still contribute to the simulation. This can help large tangled graphs look more organised. Hovering over a node will still display these links.

info_minNodeRadius.description: How small should the smallest nodes be? The smaller a node is the less it will attract other nodes.

info_maxNodeRadius.description: How large should the largest nodes be? Nodes are sized by how many links they have. The larger a node is the more it will attract other nodes. This can be used to create a good grouping around the most important nodes.

info_allowResizing.description: Whether or not to allow the sidebars to be resized

info_allowCollapsing.description: Whether or not to allow the sidebars to be collapsed

info_rightDefaultWidth.description: The default width of the right sidebar

info_leftDefaultWidth.description: The default width of the left sidebar
